item.title: About me
item.description: Hi I’m Juha Liikala. I’ve been doing what I do for quite a while now. In fact, it’s been nearly fifteen years since I started “working on the web” for a living. Most of my working days go by swimming in the sea of front-end web technologies (and hopefully, trying to stay afloat). Travel has been part of my DNA ever since my parents first took me abroad back in the 80’s.
